argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | funcinv.b | |- B = ( Base ` D ) |
| 2 |  | funcinv.s | |- I = ( Inv ` D ) |
| 3 |  | funcinv.t | |- J = ( Inv ` E ) |
| 4 |  | funcinv.f | |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) |
| 5 |  | funcinv.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | funcinv.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | funcinv.m | |- ( ph -> M ( X I Y ) N ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` D ) = ( Sect ` D ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` E ) = ( Sect ` E ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( F ( D Func E ) G <-> <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_funcrcl | |- ( <. F , G >. e. ( D Func E ) -> ( D e. Cat /\ E e. Cat ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( D e. Cat /\ E e. Cat ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 14, 5, 6, 8 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( M ( X I Y ) N <-> ( M ( X ( Sect ` D ) Y ) N /\ N ( Y ( Sect ` D ) X ) M ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( M ( X ( Sect ` D ) Y ) N /\ N ( Y ( Sect ` D ) X ) M ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> M ( X ( Sect ` D ) Y ) N ) |
| 18 | 1, 8, 9, 4, 5, 6, 17 | #P_funcsect | |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) ( Sect ` E ) ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) ) |
| 19 | 16 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> N ( Y ( Sect ` D ) X ) M ) |
| 20 | 1, 8, 9, 4, 6, 5, 19 | #P_funcsect | |- ( ph -> ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) ( ( F ` Y ) ( Sect ` E ) ( F ` X ) ) ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` E ) = ( Base ` E ) |
| 22 | 13 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) |
| 23 | 1, 21, 4 | #P_funcf1 | |- ( ph -> F : B --> ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 24 | 23, 5 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) e. ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 25 | 23, 6 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( F ` Y ) e. ( Base ` E ) ) |
| 26 | 21, 3, 22, 24, 25, 9 | #P_isinv | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) <-> ( ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) ( Sect ` E ) ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) /\ ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) ( ( F ` Y ) ( Sect ` E ) ( F ` X ) ) ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 18, 20, 26 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ph -> ( ( X G Y ) ` M ) ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ( ( Y G X ) ` N ) ) |
